text: The 2002 Raliul Brasovului was the first round of the Romanian Rally Championship. It took place between March 22–24, 2002. The Rally consisted of 12 special stages. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" width=100% style="text- align: center; font-size: 90%; max-width: 950px;" |- !Pos. !Driver !Co-driver !Car !Class !Time !Difference !Points |- !colspan="8" style="border-bottom: 2px solid LightSteelBlue;"| General |- ! 1 | align="left"| Constantin Aur | align="left"| Silviu Moraru | align="left"| Seat Cordoba WRC | A8 | 30:30.0 | 0.0 ! 10 |- ! 2 | align="left"| George Grigorescu | align="left"| Radu Dumitriu | align="left"| Renault Megane | A7 | 32:00.0 | 1:30.0 ! 6 |- ! 3 | align="left"| George Morar | align="left"| Laurentiu Campeanu | align="left"| Mitsubishi Evo VI | N4 | 32:14.9 | 1:44.9 ! 4 |- ! 4 | align="left"| Dodo Toma | align="left"| Valentin Hard | align="left"| Mitsubishi Evo VI | A8 | 32:26.7 | 1:56.7 ! 3 |- |} Category:Rally racing series
title: 2002 Raliul Brasovului
